net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.event

Interface ErrorListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.EventListener

    public interface ErrorListener
extends java.util.EventListener
    The ErrorListener interface is used to notify objects that an error condition occurred. It is used to populate the error report with application specific information.
    Author:
    Pat B. Double (double@i2rd.com)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void errorOccurred(ErrorEvent event)
      Called when an error occurs.

    • Method Detail

      • errorOccurred

        void errorOccurred(ErrorEvent event)
        Called when an error occurs. Application specific information may be added to the error information using methods in the event object.
        Parameters:
        event - The object describing the event.
